articles.title: About Me
articles.contents:
Background
My name is Bradley O’Guinn and this is my website. I
am a doctoral student in the School of Criminal Justice at the
University of Cincinnati. My research focuses on policing and the
geographic concentration of crime. I enjoy using R and
ArcGIS to analyze large amounts of data and identify
high crime places. My recent work has been featured in Crime and
Delinquency and Police Practice and Research.
Connect:

Ph.D. in Criminal Justice | August 2019 - Present
